bill.title: Community Business Strategies Y-Biz Young Adult Entrepreneurship Pilot Program; establish for Jackson Public Schools.
bill.description: An Act To Require The State Board Of Education To Establish The Community Business Strategies Y-biz Young Adult Entrepreneurship Program As A Pilot Program Within The Jackson Public School District For The Purposes Of Expanding Entrepreneurship And Business Innovation Among The Young Adult Students; To Prescribe The Criteria For Selecting Students To Participate In The Pilot Program; To Require The State Department Of Education To Administer The Community Business Strategies Y-biz Young Adult Entrepreneurship Pilot Program; To Cap The Annual Appropriation For The Pilot Program At $75,000.00; To Bring Forward Section 37-13-58, Mississippi Code Of 1972, For Purposes Of Possible Amendment; And For Related Purposes.
